Name: [Ally] Sharkboo
Desc:
All squad members' <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>.
Active Skill: Plants a homing trap underfoot which bites, tears, and summons torpedos at triggering enemies, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Ice Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Desc2: Small but functional, it's a great help to Proxies in the Hollows.
